website_summaries.verdict: A quality-made nonstick pan that comes with essential tools and recipe ideas.
pros: Pan is made from sturdy, nonstick aluminum
Maze pattern gives every brownie a crispy edge
Pan fits a standard size box of brownie mix
Included spatula is the perfect size to lift brownies from pan
cons: Pan sits at a slightly higher price point

customer_reviews.title: Love this pan!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pan, the best way to cut the brownies is to wait till they are cooled down all the way. Then take the plastic spatula that it comes with and loosen all the sides, than flip the pan over on a counter or cookie sheet and take them out of the pan and then cut them. I had no problem getting them out of the pan and the pan washed very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Mary A. Snider

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t create edges like we wanted
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pan because my daughter will eat all the brownie edges, leaving a big brownie in the middle of my pan. However, after using this three times, this doesn’t really cook the brownie with great edges, even though that’s the point. Instead of edges with a bit of density and bite (hopefully you all know what I mean!), the edges on brownies from this pan are the same texture as the rest of the brownie. There is no difference at the edge. Alas, does not really serve its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Houston... we have lift off

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pan for my hubby because there can never be enough brownie corner pieces. This pan makes him very happy! It makes me happy because it's a sturdy, heavy duty pan. It's nonstick surface is amazing--brownies don't stick at all. One thing to note is that the brownies are a little thinner than they are in my 8x8 pan when we make the Ghiradelli brownie mix. We have not tried to use two mixes instead of one yet. Worth the $!

customer_reviews.title: Always a perfect brownie
customer_reviews.text: I'm not hardcore about my brownie edges like many others appear to be. In all honesty, I tend to prefer a slightly gooey brownie. The amazing thing about this pan is that you get the best of both worlds with every brownie square. Family members who like edges get edges. Family members who like a soft, moist brownie get a soft, moist brownie. You never have to worry about dry edges to completely bake the inside, nor a liquid middle for perfect edges. Everything just always bakes perfectly. I absolutely love this thing.
